page.title: 12Beckington First School.
page.content: We have two classrooms and a dinner room. As well as for dinners we use the dinner room for cooking, 'Music and Movement' and violin lessons. Our playground is very small so we go to the Recreation Field (rec.) on Tuesday afternoons for games. A coach takes us up because the road is so dangerous. On Thursday afternoon we go in a coach to Frome sports centre for swimming. We go on trips sometimes for our Environmental work. We did a project on the church and put on an exhibtion of our work in the church. We have a computer and a disc drive, headphones and a tape recorder so that we can listen to stories, a jumbo typewriter so that we can write our own stories. A colour T.V. and a radio cassette player. All these things were bought by the Parent Teachers Assoc'n.
